summary: updated 2/05/17 added presets optimized for Climates of Tamriel.  Transform Skyrim into a dark fantasy paradise with spectacular moon-lit nights.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Dark Eden ENB

[/size][size=3]A fantasy style preset with vibrant and saturated days and bright moon-lit nights.  This version has been tested and is compatible with almost every lighting and weather mod.  [/size]

Original edition pics:
[img]https://36.media.tumblr.com/656490c3ea61cd5b65d7722fa9f760cb/tumblr_o5uz05mXX21s2ptqso4_400.jpg[/img][img]https://41.media.tumblr.com/b5202a6ff3a6d71f7c61fb5f31c9ecaf/tumblr_o5uz05mXX21s2ptqso3_400.jpg[/img]
[size=4][size=5]

Ignis Fatuus edition:[/size][size=2][size=3] foggy nights with an eerie green glow.  [/size][/size][/size][size=4][size=4][size=3][size=4][size=3]The title of this preset, and this edition, are my homage to Blood Omen - Legacy of Kain.  version 3 and greater is compatible with Night Eye[/size][/size][/size][/size]
[img]https://41.media.tumblr.com/221be4e00b6f7e0a880d76f12da560e5/tumblr_o5uz05mXX21s2ptqso5_400.jpg[/img][img]https://40.media.tumblr.com/8968d7c72e191ede5f192e78105dfb55/tumblr_o5uz05mXX21s2ptqso6_400.jpg[/img]

[/size][size=4]

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=5]Dark Eden ENB, Gothic Edition:[size=4] old technicolor film style with minimal saturation. Version 3 and greater is now compatible with Night Eye[/size][/size][/font]

[img]https://36.media.tumblr.com/055d50a5a0ce838fb921aed09fdb617b/tumblr_o5uz05mXX21s2ptqso2_400.jpg[/img][img]https://36.media.tumblr.com/59e26e6922455417235da019514a58cf/tumblr_o5uz05mXX21s2ptqso1_400.jpg[/img]

[/size]
[size=4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5]Dark Eden ENB, Nightshade Edition: [size=3]similar to the original version but with higher bloom and more purple[/size][/size][/font][size=3]

[img]https://40.media.tumblr.com/08901053879c4866e4d7eecbca08e351/tumblr_o5uz05mXX21s2ptqso8_400.jpg[/img][img]https://40.media.tumblr.com/cf3a401c2fecfe76478a24bd1a98ec8b/tumblr_o5uz05mXX21s2ptqso7_400.jpg[/img]


[/size][/size]The latest version (4.0) of Dark Eden ENB has been optimized for Climates of Tamriel. 
Version 3.5 of Dark Eden ENB was optimized for the NLA plugin.  The esp plugin from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/?]Natural Lighting and Atmospherics (NLA)[/url] is required for version 3.5

Old editions (3.0 and lower in miscellaneous and optional files section):    Older Dark Eden ENB editions were designed with vanilla lighting and weather and will look wonderful without additional lighting and weather mods.   If you use a different lighting or weather mod that those listed below, please leave a comment or post a screenshot.  The following mods are compatible with the older versions of Dark Eden ENB and have been tested with excellent results:
- natural lighting and atmospherics (outstanding for creating a dark daytime atmosphere), required for version 3.5 and above
- climates of Tamriel (use CoT for brighter days and amazing skies)
- Enhanced Lights and Effects (ELFX)
- Enhanced Lighting for ENB (ELE)
- Realistic Lighting Overhaul (RLO)
- realistic water two and watercolor for ENB (also highly recommended)
- realistic clouds


Any mod that creates glowing objects or plants will look great with either edition of this preset.



[u]These specific mods are highly recommended for an enhanced dark fantasy style experience[/u]
[size=2] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81312/?]Dark Forests of Skyrim[/url]
[/size] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79492/?]Fantasy Forest Overhaul[/url]
[size=2]- [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74924/?][size=2]Technicolor Alchemy Overhaul[/size][/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68782/?]Enhanced Landscapes[/url] with Dark Fantasy plugin (or the old [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66971/?]Dark Fantasy Overhaul[/url] without Enhanced Landscapes)
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70366/?]Vibrant red snowy thickets[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70133/?]- Deathbell HD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50696/?]- Moon Glow[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53628/?]- Morrowind Overhaul [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74621/?]- Radioactive Deathbells



[/url]

 
Installation
1.Copy the d3d9.dll and enbhost files from [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0266.htm]here[/url] to your Skyrim folder (wrapper version for BINARY 308 or greater)
2.Copy and paste the Dark Eden ENB files to your Skyrim folder containing the Skyrim.exe file (not your data folder). 
3. Edit your skyrimprefs.ini and set the following values:
[Display]
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iMultiSample=0
bFXAAEnabled=0
iMaxAnisotropy=0


CONSULT THE STEP GUIDE FOR ENB FOR MORE INFORMATION ON HOW YOU SHOULD CONFIGURE YOUR enblocal files for YOUR RIG
OR
check out[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74427/?] this great guide[/url] for ENB and Skyrim optimization

OPTIONS:
- an optional file with Depth of Field disabled is also available and suggested for older/slower computers
- thanks to Kobalk and team for permission to use their truly amazing Depth of Field from the outstanding [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67483/?]Rampage ENB[/url]

Cheers to hitori ga for providing some wonderful screenshots

Extra Thanks to MelissaGT ([url=http://melissagt.tumblr.com/]http://melissagt.tumblr.com/[/url]) for help with testing out this preset and providing some amazing screenshots

Follow me on tumblr: [url=https://www.tumblr.com/blog/belmontswhip]https://www.tumblr.com/blog/belmontswhip


[/url]CREDITS:
Boris Vorontsov - ENB Series Developer (http://enbdev.com/index_en.html)
original Depth of Field by matso
high quality Depth of Field tweaks by Kobalk and team (from Rampage ENB)
bloom shader for Nightshade edition by Kobalk and team (Rampage ENB)
SMAA by mrhaandi (http://mrhaandi.blogspot.com/p/injectsmaa.html)
ultimate shader effect add-on by Miratheus (http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=3274)
Kyo- sunsprite shader
nanoman2000: sunsprite textures (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68274/?)
palette textures by yours truly
author: mobiusbelmont
